name: marbastlib
description: Template for creating a KiCad PCM library manifest to pair with a hosted library repository.
description_full: This repository is a template for distributing KiCad libraries through the Plugin and Content Manager (PCM). It is structured to hold your library files (symbols, footprints, 3D models, etc.) alongside a properly configured manifest.json. The included GitHub Actions workflow automates packaging and release creation, so your library can be easily installed and updated via PCM. Fork this template, drop in your KiCad content, and update the manifest fields to quickly publish your own PCM-ready library.
